description: This file defines a React component for a sidebar navigation menu, including a NavItem component for individual links with active state styling. It provides navigation links related to JIRA, Confluence, and account connection within a web application's frontend.

methods.name: NavItem
methods.description: A React component that renders a navigation link with styling indicating whether it is active based on the current URL pathname.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Main React component for rendering the sidebar with navigation links.
